description: Gets details about a table. For more information, see S3 Tables in the Amazon Simple Storage Service User Guide. You must have the s3tables:GetTable permission to use this operation.

nested_items.name: tableARN
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table.

nested_items.name: namespace
nested_items.description: The namespace associated with the table.

nested_items.name: namespaceId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the namespace containing this table.

nested_items.name: versionToken
nested_items.description: The version token of the table.

nested_items.name: metadataLocation
nested_items.description: The metadata location of the table.

nested_items.name: warehouseLocation
nested_items.description: The warehouse location of the table.

nested_items.name: createdAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the table bucket was created at.

nested_items.name: createdBy
nested_items.description: The ID of the account that created the table.

nested_items.name: managedByService
nested_items.description: The service that manages the table.

nested_items.name: modifiedAt
nested_items.description: The date and time the table was last modified on.

nested_items.name: modifiedBy
nested_items.description: The ID of the account that last modified the table.

nested_items.name: ownerAccountId
nested_items.description: The ID of the account that owns the table.

nested_items.name: tableBucketId
nested_items.description: The unique identifier of the table bucket containing this table.
